alert.note: Alert for Big Horn National Forest; Sheridan County, Casper BLM (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued July 31 at 3:02AM MDT until August 01 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... The National Weather Service in Billings has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Monday afternoon through Monday evening. * IMPACTS: Low humidities, very hot temperatures, and strong gusty winds will create erratic fire behavior. * AFFECTED AREA: South-central and southeast MT, north-central WY, and northwest SD. MT fire weather zones 123, 124, 125, 126, 127, 128, 129, 130, 131, 132, and 133. WY fire weather zones 274 and 284. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In South-central MT...Gallatin...Park...Wheatland...Sweet Grass...Golden Valley...Stillwater...Carbon...Musselshell... Yellowstone...Treasure...Big Horn. In Southeast MT... Rosebud... Custer...Powder River...Fallon...Carter. In North-central WY... Sheridan. In Northwest SD...Harding. * WIND: Northwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * HUMIDITY: As low as 8 percent. * TEMPERATURES: 90 to 105 degrees.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Big Horn National Forest; Sheridan County, Casper BLM
